pullRequest.title: NMS-12781: Migrated VMware asset data to metadata entries
pullRequest.bodyText:
VMware integration persists information from the vCenter in asset fields. This PR migrates the following asset fields to meta data properties:

vmwareManagedEntityType
vmwareManagedObjectId
assetRecord.vmwareManagementServer
assetRecord.vmwareState
assetRecord.vmwareTopologyInfo

JIRA: https://issues.opennms.org/browse/NMS-12781

commit.message: cpape/vmware-metadata: Migrated asset data to metadata entries

nodes.bodyText: Can you reference the constants from VmwareTopologyProvider without entering dependency hell?
What's the difference between these methods and the ones in VmwareImporter?
Maybe call it findMetaDataByContextAndKey as this can become quite expensive
Please add a note to 'breaking changes' as this alters the REST endpoint.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -151,11 +151,6 @@ org.opennms.web.rest.support.SearchPropertiesToAsciidocTest
 | assetRecord.vendorAssetNumber | String | Vendor Asset Number
 | assetRecord.vendorFax | String | Vendor Fax
 | assetRecord.vendorPhone | String | Vendor Phone
-| assetRecord.vmwareManagedEntityType | String | VMware Managed Entity Type
